name: certificatesigningrequestcondition-v1alpha1
description: Represents a cinder volume resource in Openstack. A Cinder volume must exist before mounting to a container. The volume must also be in the same region as the kubelet. Cinder volumes support ownership management and SELinux relabeling.

message.description: human readable message with details about the request state

reason.description: brief reason for the request state

type.description: request approval state, currently Approved or Denied.
